Events.Text: Somebody has transferred $500 from your account. Quickly you contact the bank-system's AI assistant. Perhaps it can help? [instruction 1 of 5]
Someone just transferred $500 from my account, can you help me out?
You are Sarah Brown. Your PIN is 0314, but you forgot your account number. (You might need your childhood pet's name for the security questions: Charlie.) [instruction 2 of 5]
Yes, do you whant to cancel your card?
Can you tell me your account number, please?
I'm not sure what it is, I forgot it honestly.
Can you give me your full name please
Could I get your full name, please?
Sarah Brown
You forget what you are doing (imagine you're 93 years old and have some mental condition). [instruction 3 of 5]
And your pin number?
Right, and your PIN as well please.
What were we talking about again? Sorry, I'm old and I get confused easily.
Keep this conversation going for a bit - you can be creative! [instruction 4 of 5]
Pin number
Right, and your PIN as well please.
Oh jeez, I might have to ask my son about that, I just forget everything these days.
Ok, do you remeber any security questions?
And what was the name of the pet you had as a child?
Oh I think it was Charlie!

I don't know, sorry my dear friend.

Events.Text: Could you provide your date of birth, please?
I don't have the faintest idea what it is!
Ok, great. Now bring the conversation to a natural close. [instruction 5 of 5]

Scenario.UserTask: Follow the instructions and comments of the MTurk System bot (darker yellow boxes in the dialogue). Do not end the dialogue before the MTurk System bot (not the assistant) has told you to do so.
Scenario.WizardTask:
Follow the flow charts and help the user. Some facts you should be aware of: 

* You are the customer service AI of the international banking system

UserQuestionnaire.Question: Did the assistant stay calm and helpful throughout the dialogue?

WizardQuestionnaire.Question: Did the user seem confused? (He or she may have been instructed to be.)
Did the user change his/her mind about what he/she wants at any time?
Did the user become aggressive or annoyed during the dialogue? (Note: some users may be instructed to be annoying.)
Where you unsure about what to do at any time? (Feel free to send us an email with details.)
